name: 泰娅·法尔科
awards: 2013年 第57届意大利大卫奖 最佳女主角 (提名) 我和你

last_movies.title: La nostra magnifica ossessione - Bernardo Bertolucci e la su

introduction: Tea Falco was born in Catania in 1986 and discovers want to use photography as a medium through which to travel the world under the age of thirteen, when her mother gives her a Zenit with the shoulder strap green hope. We define sensist: defies death with the art to explore the world playing with a camera.It is young but has already won an award for contemporary art prize Basilio Cascella, 2011, for 55 years one of the most prestigious Awards of art in Italy, he has exposed the 'last year in Los Angeles ADC contemporany art gallery, Greece, and continues to exhibit in Italy (Rome, Catania, Herculaneum, Bologna, Ortona).From the origins of perfume pervaded by an intense Sicilian landscape, Tea dragged flavors and aromas of the roots in the capital: She lives in Rome, working in a job that wants to destroy and recreate the real through continuous exploration passionate as amniotic. Actress and photographic artist, in her poetic come to light ironic confrontation between the body and the environment, between the brain and soul.All her work is autobiographical self-timer.Through its 'handwriting' wants to send a 'fun distressing'.Thus, only deformed, manages to bring together all the pieces of her soul.
